p: Literature shows that Neural Network have been successfully considered for solving many medical problems, including the prediction of the occurrence of dengue cases [ 39], the risk classification of dengue patients [ 40, 41] and the identification and classification of species of the Anopheles, Aedes, and Culex, based on wing shape characters with identification of 100% of Aedes aegypti [ 42]. However, the identification of the most productive breeding sites of Aedes aegypti using Neural Network is relatively new and we did not find published articles in this field.
